"Wild Easter 2019":
"This is bad, this is bad!
A ton of Phantoms and ESC-A Darkers
have appeared around the Easter event
venue in Las Vegas on planet Earth!
At this rate, the event will be cancelled!
Clear the enemies out of the venue so the
event can go ahead as planned!
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Time limit expires"

"Now starting the transfer!
Your mission is to eliminate
the enemies that have
appeared around the venue!"

"Your route takes you through a
large gathering of Phantoms and
ESC-A Darkers! You'll need to
work together to get past them!"

"We've also detected an especially
powerful reading right at the heart
of the venue. Please be careful!"
